com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.api

Class AbstractCommentCollectionConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.api.AbstractCommentCollectionConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommentCollectionConfiguration
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFileLibraryConfiguration, BaseForumConfiguration

    public class AbstractCommentCollectionConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommentCollectionConfiguration
    Base implementation of the CommentCollectionConfiguration.
